cause.description:
ZACH NEVER GETS ALLOWANCE, AND HARDLY MONEY. HE IS DOING OTHER THINGS BESIDES THIS TO EARN MONEY. (SO YOU DONT THINK HES JUST LAZY). HE NEEDS WHATEVER DONATION YOU CAN GIVE, SO HE CAN GET A MACBOOK.
*NONE OF THIS IS A LIE. *BUT ITS FUNNY.
1. THAT ALL ZACH GARMAN'S SHOULD HAVE A MACBOOK.
2. THAT ALL ZACHARY GARMANS SHOULD HAVE A MACBOOK.
3. ZACHARY COLE GARMANS SHOULD HAVE A MACBOOK.
cause.mission: PROVIDE ZACH WITH A APPLE MACBOOK
cause.name: HELP ZACH GET A LAPTOP
